div.p: KC notes that this feature tests index terms in a feature. After reviewing the preceding graphic on CSR and profitability, click on this learning link which reinforces the data from the Yahoo! Finance chart above. It is a video interview with George Pohle, VP and Global Leader of the Business Strategy Consulting Division at IBM Global Business Services. The interview focuses on how ensuring that corporate social responsibility is at the core of a business' strategy can yield financial benefits. IBM conducted a survey of top business executives which indicated that 68% of those surveyed say they are using CSR activities to help generate revenue.
